name: Dental Filling for Cavities
description: To treat a cavity your dentist will remove the decayed portion of the tooth and then fill the area on the tooth where the decayed material was removed.

name: Regular Dental Cleaning
description: Regular teeth cleanings are totally non-invasive, and are the cornerstone of preventive dentistry. It's usually best to have your teeth cleaned every six months.

name: Tingling Sensation Pulpit
description: Pulpit, often referred to as a toothache, is an inflammation of the dental pulp â€” the connective tissues and cells in the center of your teeth.
